dedenbach2011,"2016-10-26T16:33:43.4Z","Lil'Hulk","

Polybags are awesome and it is super cool to get a Hulk version like this one.

column2: This little bag comes with a little 4 wheeler build that Hulk can rip apart (like on the picture on the bag) because it is a Hydra 4 wheeler.&nbsp
column4: s cool that you can either use the vehicle while playing or just have him hold it for display.&nbsp
column5: It is actually the same little vehicle that Kraven the Hunter has it the Bridge Battle set.

column2: Even cooler is this bag comes with extra stickers for your other Hydra and Shield vehicles.&nbsp
column3: I think it is such a good idea (even though a lot of people HATE stickers) and my son enjoyed customizing his vehicles.&nbsp
column4: The Rocket Raccoon polybag also comes with extra stickers.

column2: It is basically a small version of the newer bigfig of Hulk and he looks great.&nbsp
column3: The other smaller hulk is the bright green one with wacky purple pants that looks like it might be the Lou Ferigno hulk.&nbsp
column4: This hulk has the same hair that Tony Stark has.

column1: Well... Hulk has become one of the most popular superheroes recently so I was glad to get a different version for my collection.
column2: He looks great with all my other Avenger sets.&nbsp
column3: I held onto my stickers for a rainy day but 5 year old had a blast putting all of his on his sets.&nbsp
